storyInfo: In the central district of Chernobog's core city, Sarkaz mercenaries raise their swords against the Infected of Reunion. And Amiya, with Rosmontis, leads her team with determination.

attributes.content: Law, original law, had behind it, in synonymous form with vengeance, the same original need—the need for violence.
City-states made pledges to their people, and used sumptuous lives and stable surroundings to appease them—
To let their lifespans serve one man-made purpose, to tame their innate will to subjugate, to teach them to be at ease, to lead them to be weak.
Our Majesty is sage, perceptive.

A great many city-states will treat strength as a crime, will take deficient courage as a virtue, will regard fear of death as progress. Our Majesty will tear their last semblances from them, make them reflect, make them search themselves.
We, as a human race, have always had a kind of thirst flowing through our blood vessels; a thirst to loose our own life force by our actions.
Fairness is not by nature. Fairness is dependent on having the wisdom, the force of will to create it.
Our Majesty intends to recover all they need, all this the cities took away, and give it back to them.
New purpose will be declared. Our Majesty will rebuild their thought worn flat by daily life and boredom, and rouse the sanguine courage within them bound by deadened ethics for too long.
Violence runs our bodies through and through. If we don't allow it to germinate within ourselves, we will become resentful, insignificant and numb, and thus will incur our own destruction.
Those who fear habitually are despicable.
If one wants to be alive, they ought to be immersed in the heart of violence, see clearly how so much of ethics is a sham, understand the barren of our present world.
Only violence is real, able to be felt.

Not punishment, not rule, not the weighing of values and the decorum of appeasement. We will use our fists and weapons to tell them that we are alive, and that we ought to be alive. The right to life is reserved for the living.

I do not blame Our Majesty the Emperor for the punishment handed down on me. I showed contempt, ignorant of the times, for how he spoke all on his benevolent mind to the masses, for he was loathe for his people to all too quickly suffer the pain of violent change.
Even so, I cannot cease to tell the candid truth. I must constantly, continually praise Our Majesty's most profound insight. I can only shout my honesty. I cannot be silent.
The reality is, we do not want whatever justice, nor do we expect peace.
Only the shortsighted, rushing about their own interests, can wallow in peace.

What we want is to put to use the violence that surges in our veins, the nature of us aroused by the dawn of our own civilization, the origin of our dauntless struggle and victory. We want to make use of violence.
Dress it up any way to make our needs seem sensible, but that is irrelevant.
Should we need, we should seek directly. Leave the dressing up to the historians and the champions of morals. They only need justification, while our survival is more justified than any theory.
We want to injure people, defeat people, destroy people, and if Ursus reckons this disaster, then we should bring disaster to others, to people beyond Ursus.
If they do not stand strong, they should be eliminated. Some are fitter to survive than others, and fitter to succeed.
Weakness is evil. Strength is sublime. Our laws should be founded on the needs of the city's soundest. Our country should not serve the maggots, let alone nurture the innumerous ill.
May those I despise, those narrow-minded leisure-seeking subjects, be tried and found forever in the lake of blood. May Our Majesty lead Ursus to eternal prosperity.
—The last sermon of a heretical sovereign preacher as he walked the gallows, sentenced by the Emperor of Ursus to hang.
Chernobog Core City, Central District
Spies! Ursus spies!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: They're right here! Tell everyone, they're right here!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Kill them, kill them! Hang them above the connecting floor, crush them against the top of Lungmen!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Let's retreat, Rosmontis. They've occupied the entire commercial plaza. This entire block's been sealed off by them now.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Rosmontis...!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Let me do this. If we take a diversion, we'll be attacked by Reunion somewhere else.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Hey, you! Eyes on that Caster... watch her! Don't let her try anything!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Kill them all already! Quick!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Right! Right! Kill 'em, kill 'em all!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: (Columbian-Victorian) You want to kill me?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You're all blind to it! You've all got Ursus chains on your necks!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Rosmontis, this isn't worth it! They've pretty much lost their minds! Let's move out of this block, find a different breach point!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Bowguns up! Bowguns up... blow it off! Blow her head off! You're like that bunny who was just here... you're like her!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Amiya didn't go this way because she didn't want to do things like I do.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The hell are you all staring like that for? You're an Infected, you're an Infected! Why're you all staring at me like that? !
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Collaborators? Trying to make it home? Like hell, hahah, like bleeding hell! Ursus can't defeat us! We've won! Won!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Fire! Fire at her, at her!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: No point.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No point. I don't want you to hurt me, so there's nothing you can do.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What the hell... what the hell?! Keep firing! Keep firing! Blow the whole place out!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Is that a wall? What kind of Arts... what the hell kind of—! The bolts are all breaking against it! They're breaking!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Stop attacking those wall things, it's useless! Just looking at 'em tells you they won't budge! Call the Casters in!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The hell do you know?! We're attacking her face-on!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: But before the arrows can reach her, and before the shrapnel can strike her face, they hit something! Some kind of invisible wall or something, whatever the hell! They just shatter! They can't get in!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Stupid goddamn Caster! We'll see how long you hold out... how much have you even got?! You can't keep this up for long, we'll see how long you hold out!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Why, why... can you not just hit her? She's not doing a damn thing! The hell are your ballistas, huh? The hell are your empowered crossbows?!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Bombard her, blow her to kingdom come! Blow her to smithereens! Blow her up like all those goddamned Ursus, and then make her tonight's stew!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: This is the Rosmontis Squad, Amiya! We're through to you... talk her down! You need to talk her down!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Rosmontis, listen to the comms!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: All you uniforms! Ahah! All you uniforms, we'll hang you, dry you on the power lines, let the rottenfeathers peck you apart!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: We'll let you know! Know what you get for looking down on us!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Looking down on us, beating us, giving us those looks. Hahah—gack—we'll kill you all.
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: We'll throw you all into an engine, drr-dr-dr-dr-dr-dr-dr, and watch the minced meat come out, hahahahahah...!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: What are you DOING? What are you prancing about for?! Don't expose your squad's position!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't waste your breath... goddamn devil! Hard-horned brute! What makes you think you can order ME?
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: You think you're Talulah? You think you're that undying goddamn beast? Whoopsie, he's already done for! Bang!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: You'll all be done for! Us Ursus Infected'll... kill you! Kill the lot of you! You're all—
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: And the Sarkaz kicks the Infected straight out of the window.
The Infected howls, or perhaps it's more of a laugh, as he falls from the seventh floor to the ground, and is immediately obliterated by the ballistas.
*Spit*.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Do it. Bring out the big guns. Kill 'em dead.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Amiya, can you hear me? We're taking the route we agreed. Out.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: What are the guerrillas' current movements?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: By our recon Operators' reports, the already-assembled guerrillas are currently in Central Main Street, openly attacking other Reunion guards.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: There's also a few small guerrilla squads opting to retreat instead, and they're scattering across every part of the city...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...I see. The guerrillas still have other obligations.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But our two teams are already too occupied to account for the situation anywhere else in the Core City.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The longer it takes to break through the blockade, the less time we'll have left.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If the other anti-guerrilla Infected are kept pinned down by the guerrillas, we'll be able to reach the command tower much faster. We can't waste this opportunity.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll leave controlling the overall situation to Raidian and Mantra's judgment. As for controlling the battlefield...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I and Rosmontis both need more space to think.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But. Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: After we rule out any ambush interference, we're still guaranteed other roundabout routes. But Rosmontis, I think, more or less can only choose to eliminate obstacles in front of her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: More or less. That's how she's already done things.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit was on the mark. We're in one heck of a mess.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Reunion has already fallen apart, seeing as their infighting is killing them faster than the guerrilla attacks are.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: They usually have enough friction of their own, but then Patriot died, and that news blew up, and now everything's gone haywire.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: With all the devastation the whole way here, I'm hard-pressed to say they're that united anymore.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Notify the other team members to assemble. Have the Casters bring the drones back in. We're going to converge with Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, Amiya.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Everything's dealt with here now.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Sorry, Amiya. There had to be a better way we could've done this.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: It's how I wanted to do it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Negotiations falling through isn't a problem. The way they are, it's impossible to communicate.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: And they're doing bad things. If I left them alone, they'd just do even more bad things.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: An entire building... you took an entire building...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Did I go too far?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No, no. Just, I've just never been on a mission with you before. Seeing it for myself is a shocker.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You really are the ace up Rhodes Island's sleeve. Our strongest war machine...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: (Amiya, did I say something wrong?)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The evening before the core city Operation Team's departure from the ship
I won't allow it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit. This time, I'm going to have to do it this way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've gone over this question countless times before, Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your Originium Arts expend your physical strength. This goes even as far as the physiological activity your metabolism requires.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your life is... passing. You're not a machine, nor a ship's cannon. You cannot have your parts changed, nor can you be further processed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No. Maybe you still don't know.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...There'd be another memory from far too long ago. I'm not certain how much pressure it would bring about on your body.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Every simulation's result is leagues from anything ideal. I can rule out this choice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then how about this, Dr. Kal'tsit. Let me put it this way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This time, I need to do things this way. I'll be taking off one more ring.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, we are going over a form of violence. You have said as much to me. If you didn't want me to stop you here and now, then you wouldn't have asked me to swear it to you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Chairman and I cast these rings together. It was so that no-one who came after would easily walk that path again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm using them, Dr. Kal'tsit. I won't argue for weapons, and I would never say that any kind is better for its ability to kill faster.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: However, what Miss Theresa left to me was not the same thing at all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Since the very beginning, perhaps they were never designed as weapons.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They shouldn't be used to kill anyone... they never should. When they're used, what I think of is who I should save.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is the conclusion I've come to, after years of coexisting with them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Trusting a kind of weapon is not in any way a wise act.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you wish to use them as a surgical tool and not as a lethal weapon, then you must be in control of their blade.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A blade is a blade to both the enemy and me, no matter how you use it. Its characteristics will not change.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya... they will incise you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, I'm not afraid.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wounds can heal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But they can leave behind scars. Scars that nobody can bear to look at.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Mngh.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I... I won't give up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Originium has already changed my body in ways you know. Any further wounds... they'd be one or two wounds, and nothing more.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I am not a weapon.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you need me to bring up another hurtful example?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —What case?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who can prove that you and I are not a kind of weapon?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Who can come to define whether or not we are a kind of weapon?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Can weapons think? Are weapons that can think all the more fearsome? Are weapons with self-awareness automatically no longer a kind of weapon?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, Amiya. I disagree.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if I know—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You've already grown up.
I can't stop you.
Your decisions are yours to make.
Yes, Operator. You've misspoken.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Have you ever seen, um... such a...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...cute...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...weapon... before?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Um. No, not that I'm saying...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya... is cuter.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: S—Sorry! I can't think of... I can't think of another way to put it...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're people. People, with a full complement of emotions.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After this is over, find the chance to apologize to her, okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't, don't, Amiya. It's okay.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Let's go. Together.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Ah, wait, Rosmontis... I think I might fall here!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm going to hold on tight to you. I can't let those guys, those Infected. I can't let them hurt you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: A little slower... let's go a little slower, okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Maybe i shouldn't have said it like that. But...)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Central District
Ngh, guh.
attributes.name: Herdified Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: No. No come near.
attributes.name: Herdified Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I see it. Nobody with even normal eyesight could ignore this sort of phenomenon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Do you still remember the special Infected you came across back in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Infected Reunion boy who could induce mutation within other Infected's organs.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mephisto's Herd?!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Even the devils...
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Don't. Don't, forward, any more, inside.
attributes.name: Herdified Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What are you...? We need to lay out our defenses forward! The rebels have almost fought their way here!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Goddamnit, Mephisto. What are you thinking? If we detoured, they wouldn't attack us...
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Nothing but, pain.
attributes.name: Herdified Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Wait a moment, wait a moment! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: Pain.
attributes.name: Herdified Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Let go of me! Let go!
attributes.name: Reunion Infected

attributes.content: All units, we're moving back. Keep cover.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We'll change entranceways after that. Something bad's happened already.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
